dct_title_s: Metropolitan New York and World's Fair 1939 / General Drafting Company, Inc.
dct_description_sm: Panel title. Distributed by Colonial Beacon Oil Company. Includes index, text, illustrations and mileage chart. Pictorial map of the New York Word's Fair 1939 locates Petroleum industry exhibition building.
dct_subject_sm: New York World's Fair (1939-1940 New York, N.Y.)—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: New York World's Fair (1939-1940 New York, N.Y.)—Maps
